data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Tehran, Iran to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tehran, Iran
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Tehran who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 13,267,600 people living in the state of Tehran.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 13,267,600 souls in Tehran and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Persian people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Persian people know you.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Tehran, Iran to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Tehran, Iran.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tehran, Iran has a population of 13,267,600.

We estimate Tehran has 69,120 people who might know Jesus, 179,162 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13,019,318 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Tehran who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
